name: Nikunj Champakbhai Rohit
bio: As a driven and ambitious Undergraduate student at L.D. College of Engineering, Ahmedabad, studying Information Technology, I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow. I am currently delving into the cutting-edge world of blockchain and web3 technology, and as an open-source enthusiast, I have gained valuable experience in web development, android development, and problem-solving. My passion for technology drives me to be highly motivated and dedicated to my work, constantly pushing the boundaries of what is possible. I am confident that my determination and drive will enable me to make a significant impact in the tech industry.
